name: READY TO SHIP - #075 - BEST SELLER - Poppy Double Headband
description:
Crystal Headband Collection -  BEST SELLER - This piece is one our all time best seller headband. 

The ORIGINAL Poppy DOUBLE rhinestone headband - don't be fooled by the copy cats! This piece is made from 14 inches of gorgeous double band rhinestone trim is attached to silk ribbon ties in the color of your choice (White or Light Ivory). The ends of the ribbon are also embellished front and back with trim detail for the perfect finishing touch. 

14 inches of double band rhinestone trim - ovals are 5/8 inch at the widest point
20 inch silk ribbon ties with 1 inch of rhinestone detail at the ends

Ships within 2 to 3 days of cleared payment.  All items are made to order and are therefore FINAL SALE. Please see our shop policies for more information.

name: #086 - Lux Extra Large Rose Headband
description:
Floral Collection -  Our signature statement piece. This gorgeous giant rose is made from the most beautiful silk organza petals and attached to a thin silk wrapped headband. 

Rose is approximately 12 inches in diameter when laying flat but will flop slightly when worn as a headband. 

Available in: Blush (shown), Black or White

This piece can also be made on a 1 inch wide double sided satin ribbon that ties in the back. If interested just write a note at checkout and choose a ribbon color from the above choices.

Please allow 3 weeks for production of this item. All items are made to order and are therefore FINAL SALE. Please see our shop policies for more information.

name: AMANDINE Lux Collection - SS12 313
description:
Lux Collection - This vintage inspired floral beaded motif is completely handmade using the finest materials. Tediously hand beaded and accented with gorgeous rhinestones this piece is a true show stopper. We especially love the hand made floral detail on this piece - all delicately handmade.

Each piece is attached to 3 small combs for east placement in almost any hairstyle - towards the front like a headband or in the back of an up do. 

8.5 inches long and 3 inches wide

Please allow 6 weeks for production of this item. All items are made to order and are therefore FINAL SALE. Please see our shop policies for more information

name: #104 - Bohemian Rhinestone Wrap Headband
description:
Crystal Headband Collection -  THE ORIGINAL BOHEMIAN RHINESTONE HEAD WRAP

A new take on the headband. We invented this new piece for those looking to accomplish a bohemian look. 

The piece is made from 5 feet of 6mm rhinestone chain that is connected to mini alligator clips. To wear the piece simply wrap the chain starting from front to back then clip the ends to your hair for a secure hold. 

5 feet of rhinestone trim with mini alligator clip closures 

Metal Hardware Available in: Silver, Gun Metal (shown), Rust or Gold
**rhinestones will remain clear - only metal color will change**

Please allow 3 weeks for production of this item. All items are made to order and are therefore FINAL SALE. Please see our shop policies for more information
